Flow.description: SFDC - 7523 - Ensure that Contract/OLIs correctly populate on Renewal Opportunity SFDC-2726 CONTACT STATUSES: Contact Status Automation SFDC-7195 Flip LCE Changes + Stage 0 Opps LCEs SFDC-7172: Update Account on ICWorkflows for change in Opportunity Account SFDC-7145 Consolidate OLI updates in Opp After Save (again after testing) SFDC-7145 Consolidate OLI updates in Opp After Save SFDC-7069 Remove Create Project from OLI improvements subflow trigger SFDC-6007 ATTRIBUTION: If Contact Removed from Primary Contact on Opp, Remove Opp from Lifecycle Events related to old user SFDC-3839 ATTRIBUTION - Create Opportunity with Contact Chosen + Update Lifecycle Events SFDC-4156 ATTRIBUTION: Indicate on Contact If We've Won With Them, Open and Closed SFDC-7251 - Service Order for In App to Contract Switch didnt generate order SFDC-6330- Primary Contact on Klaviyo Store People Relation SFDC-6555 Need to reference Most Recent New Term Signature date on Amendment SFDC-5673 Retire Workato Downgrade Pre-Churn Integration SFDC-5842 Update Renewal Term Length population SFDC-5878 Create Most Recent Term Start Date field on Contract SFDC-5751 Add Klaviyo Store lookup to Discount record SFDC-5573 Updates Contract with Primary Quotes Renewal term length SFDC-5538 - Evaluate KPU Roll-up Summary Fields In Real Time SFDC-5680 - Trigger Sub-Flow: Create Project from OLI when pro serve opp is closed won SFDC-5267 - Adjust Discount record creation logic SFDC-5502 - Update rev reclass logic to work with PWR SFDC-5574 - Adjust Contract/Subscription End Dates to be able to be in the future SFDC-5699 - Prevent errors caused by Rev Reclass process Updated the logic to update opportunity only once(SFDC-2321, SFDC-2479 and SFDC-5333) Added SFDC-5333 Removed SFDC-5333 - Auto Close Contracted Opps(Send Big Deal Alerts even if closed date is not today) SFDC-4721 - SFDC quote fields to carry over to new A&R quotes SFDC-5499 - Continued Rev Type reclass issues SFDC-5428 - Move "OLI: First 90 Credited AOS" formula to Flow SFDC-5333 - Auto Close Contracted Opps(Send Big Deal Alerts even if closed date is not today) SFDC-3346/4922/5314 - Skip OLI creation for discount removal opps SFDC-5165 Allow For Expiring/Future Dated Discount Offers SFDC-4922 Expire any active discounts for termination Opps and flag No removal Opp SFDC-5152 Update Partner Splits with referral partner payout % at closed won SFDC-4362 Update Contract on open Opps at the same KPU when the New Type Opportunity is closed SFDC-4360 Delete and repopulate all OLIs/Contract field when KPU is changed on the Opportunity SFDC-5011 Bypass discount record creation for first time integration created unpurchased cloned opp product SFDC-4365: Create roll ups + automation on KPU SFDC-4905 Update to Vivun logic SFDC-4493 SA request/ opp team member created when MM SFDC-4728 - Reactivations for FY'24 Comp: Hold Period should only reset if within calendar month SFDC-4526 Salesforce Implementation: Opportunity REST Webservice for cloning Sales Opp + Sales Rep email alert changes SFDC-4666 - Change logic that prevents auto close for API user SFDC-4680 Ignore Professional Services Products for Discount Expiration [Skipped as NOT prod ready] SFDC-4493 SA request/ opp team member created when MM SFDC-4459 - Updating API version to 57 SFDC-4620 Quota Calculation row lock errors SFDC-4212 Recalculate Quota Credit & Ownership Credit when Revenue Type gets updated on Opportunity Line Item object SFDC-4378 Remove Opportunity Auto-close logic from Salesforce SFDC-4156 Add Logic to update related Primary Contacts with date values when Opps are created or Closed SFDC-4337 Reverting automation that updates new contact statuses SFDC-4299 - Contracted discount adjustments SFDC-3754 Update OLIs when Referral Partner is changed on Opportunity SFDC-2726 11/22/23 Adding logic to updating related contact's Qualification Status to "Opportunity Won" or "Disqualification" if opp is closed won or closed lost. SFDC-2586 Big Deal Alerts Bug Fix 10/5/23 - RRS updating for People Events PWR (SFDC-3457)

formulas.description: SFDC-3194 Returns true if the Account address is equal to Primary Quotes address
formulas.name: booleanAccountQuoteSameAddresses

formulas.description: Did the partner attend the Acquisition Campaign within sixty days of today?
formulas.name: booleanAttendedAcquisitionCampaignWithinSixtyDays

formulas.description: SFDC-5267: Used in "Should Discount Record be created" decision node, to check for KID from Kstore post PWR changes
formulas.name: booleanIsKlaviyoAccountIdPopulated

formulas.description: Set to true if the record was created in this transaction. Used in decision criteria.
formulas.name: booleanIsNew

formulas.description: Check if PWR Phase 1(PWR_Phase_1_Custom_Setting__c) custom setting is enabled
formulas.name: booleanIsPWRPhase1CustomSettingOn

formulas.description: Check if PWR Phase 1(PWR_Phase_2_Custom_Setting__c) custom setting is enabled
formulas.name: booleanIsPWRPhase2CustomSettingOn

formulas.description: SFDC-4728 Returns true if Amendment is closed the same month that a product on the Contract has been canceled
formulas.name: booleanNewProductsClosedSameMonthAsCancelledProds
formulas.expression:
AND( OR( ISCHANGED({!$Record.StageName}), {!booleanIsNew} ), ISPICKVAL({!$Record.Type}, "Amendment"), TEXT({!$Record.StageName}) = "Closed Won", NOT(ISBLANK({!$Record.Net_New_Products__c})),
MONTH({!$Record.Contract__r.Most_Recent_Product_Cancellation__c}) = MONTH({!$Record.CloseDate}), YEAR({!$Record.Contract__r.Most_Recent_Product_Cancellation__c}) = YEAR({!$Record.CloseDate}) )

formulas.description: SFDC-4728 Returns true if Opp is closed on the same month as a cancelation
formulas.name: booleanOppClosedSameMonthAsCancellation

formulas.description: TP98132. Checks if the opp type is one of: Land New Account, Reactivation or Expand Additional Product.
formulas.name: booleanOppTypeIsNew
formulas.expression: OR( ISPICKVAL({!$Record.Type__c}, "Land: New Account"), ISPICKVAL({!$Record.Type__c}, "Land: Account Reactivation"), ISPICKVAL({!$Record.Type__c}, "Expand: Additional Product"))

formulas.description: Close Date - Lead Submission Date is <= Partner Registration Expiration Days
formulas.name: booleanPlatformPartnerExpired

formulas.description: today - 180 days
formulas.name: date180DaysAgo

formulas.description: Date value of the CreatedDate on the record (which is a Date/Time)
formulas.name: dateCreatedDate

formulas.description: Checks if the end date is set, if so will set on Contract, otherwise will make no change.
formulas.name: dateEndDate

formulas.description: SFDC-256 - Gets the first day of the current month for use in Quota get element
formulas.name: dateFirstDayCurrentMonth

formulas.description: SFDC-5878 SFDC-7251 Updated to work on every New Term Quote
formulas.name: dateMostRecentTermStartDate

formulas.description: Date value of the CreatedDate for the next most recently created open Opportunity for the Primary Contact on this record (from varNextMostRecentOpp)
formulas.name: dateNextMostRecentOpenOppCreatedDate

formulas.description: SFDC-3299 Used to overwrite Contract Service Order date if a new value exists on the Opportunity
formulas.name: dateServiceOrderDate

formulas.description: SFDC-5673 Returns a datetime if Downgrade Pre Churn Reclassification should be triggered on related OLIs
formulas.name: datetimeRunPreChurnReclass

formulas.description: Calculating 80 Days Ago
formulas.name: EightyDaysAgo

formulas.description: Calculating 45 Days from Calculated Last Activity Date field on the Account
formulas.name: FortyFiveDaysAgo

formulas.description: 91 Days ago from today Date
formulas.name: NinetyOneDaysAgo

formulas.description: Combines the Payout Percent and the Promotion Percent to set the payout.
formulas.name: numberTotalPayoutPercent

formulas.description: SFDC-6555 ID of the Quote that most recently started a new term for this customer
formulas.name: textMostRecentNewTermQuote

variables.description: SFDC-7145: Consolidate OLI updates in Opp After Save
variables.name: datetimeSetFirstCreditedAOS

variables.description: Variable used in the loop to add related Opportunity Products to Update
variables.name: opportunityProductsToUpdate

variables.description: Populated by the Sub-Flow: Auto-create Opp Products on Expansion Opps. Used in the Sub-flow: Auto-create Opp Products upon Conversion to prevent the creation of duplicate OLIs
variables.name: varAmendmentOLIProductFamilies

variables.description: SFDC-2903 If populated, triggers PoT Pricing calculation for OLIs
variables.name: varCalculatePoTPricing

variables.description: Set in assignment step, defaults to current close date.
variables.name: varCloseDate

variables.description: Contact related to opportunity by opp contact role
variables.name: varContact

variables.description: Contact Collection to be used to update the status to Opportunity Won or Disqualified depending on if the opportunity is Closed Won or Closed Lost
variables.name: varContactsCollection

variables.description: Sets in assignment step, defaults to current value if not assigned.
variables.name: varFlowOwnerRole

variables.description: Record Variable for the next-most-recent open Opportunity for the Contact associated with the current record
variables.name: varNextMostRecentOpp

variables.description: Sets Owner Manager. Default to current value, done this way to avoid extra DML statements.
variables.name: varOwnerManager

variables.description: SFDC-2904 if populated, this will trigger the population of Original Product Sold By fields on the OLI
variables.name: varPopulateOriginalProductSoldBy

variables.description: SFDC-2904 if a value is populated for this OLI field, Quota and Ownership credit fields will be calculated
variables.name: varPopulateQuotaCompOLIfields

variables.description: SFDC-521 Used for changes related to SMS/Email Competitor/Contract End Date.
variables.name: varRelatedAccount

variables.description: SFDC-2903 If populated, will trigger Revenue Type Backfill
variables.name: varRevTypeBackfill

variables.description: if populated, will trigger split automation on the OLI
variables.name: varRunSplitAutomation

variables.description: SFDC-2903 If populated, will trigger the setting of Partners on the OLI
variables.name: varSetPartners

variables.description: SFDC-2903 If populated, will trigger Subscription Refresh via the OLI
variables.name: varSubscriptionRefresh

variables.description: returns true if an Opportunity Product was created in the MPO Auto Close sub-flow
variables.name: varWasAutoCloseOLICreated
